con:request.name: ProcessCard
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:acr="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.Common" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.v6.Common" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <tem:ProcessCard> <tem:request> <acr:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</acr:MerchantId> <acr:Password>${Password}</acr:Password> <acr:UserId>${UserId}</acr:UserId> <acr1:GeoLocationInformation xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:IMEI xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:Amount>${Amount}</acr1:Amount> <acr1:AuthorizationNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CardExpirationDate>${CardExpDate}</acr1:CardExpirationDate> <acr1:CardLastFourDigits>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim().reverse().take(4).reverse()}</acr1:CardLastFourDigits> <acr1:CardNumber>${=context.expand( '${MagneticData}' ).split( "=" )[0].trim()}</acr1:CardNumber> <acr1:CardVerificationNumber>${CardCVV}</acr1:CardVerificationNumber> <acr1:CardholderVerificationMethod xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CurrencyCode>${CurrencyCode}</acr1:CurrencyCode> <acr1:CustomerBillingAddress>${CustomerAddress}</acr1:CustomerBillingAddress> <acr1:CustomerCity xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerCode>${CustomerCode}</acr1:CustomerCode> <acr1:CustomerEmailAddress>${CustomerEmail}</acr1:CustomerEmailAddress> <acr1:CustomerPhone xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerState xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:CustomerZipCode>${CustomerZipCode}</acr1:CustomerZipCode> <acr1:InvoiceDetail xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:InvoiceNumber>${InvoiceNumber}</acr1:InvoiceNumber> <acr1:KeySerialNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:MagneticData xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:NameOnCard>${NameOnCard}</acr1:NameOnCard> <acr1:Pin xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber>${PONumber}</acr1:PurchaseOrderNumber> <acr1:ReferenceNumber xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:SecureCode xsi:nil="true" /> <acr1:TerminalCapabilities>Manual</acr1:TerminalCapabilities> <acr1:TransactionType>Sale</acr1:TransactionType> </tem:request> </tem:ProcessCard> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: AddRecurringContract
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:acr1="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.v6.Common" xmlns:tem="http://tempuri.org/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <tem:AddRecurringContract>\r <tem:addContractRequestVO>\r <tem:Username>${UserId}</tem:Username>\r <tem:Password>${Password}</tem:Password>\r <tem:MerchantId>${MerchantId}</tem:MerchantId>\r <tem:StartDate>${CurrentDateTime1}</tem:StartDate>\r <tem:MaxRetry>0</tem:MaxRetry>\r <tem:Type>BYDATERANGE</tem:Type>\r <tem:EndDate>2017-02-16T00:00:00</tem:EndDate>\r <tem:NextBillDate>2017-01-16T00:00:00-05:00</tem:NextBillDate>\r <tem:SubTotal>10</tem:SubTotal>\r <tem:Tax>0</tem:Tax>\r <tem:Frecuency>WEEKLY</tem:Frecuency>\r <tem:PaymentQuote>0</tem:PaymentQuote>\r <tem:Customer>\r <tem:ExternalCode>test001</tem:ExternalCode>\r <tem:FirstName>FranSoap</tem:FirstName>\r <tem:LastName>FranSoap</tem:LastName>\r <tem:Company>QA</tem:Company>\r <tem:EmailAdress>test@cenpos.com</tem:EmailAdress>\r <tem:Status>ACTIVE</tem:Status>\r <tem:BillingAddress1>14290</tem:BillingAddress1>\r <tem:ZipCode>34609</tem:ZipCode>\r </tem:Customer>\r <tem:Cards>\r <tem:CardVO>\r <tem:Token>test</tem:Token>\r <tem:Id>0</tem:Id>\r <tem:BillingAddress1>12345</tem:BillingAddress1>\r <tem:Country>USA</tem:Country>\r <tem:Province />\r <tem:CardContractType>PRINCIPAL</tem:CardContractType>\r <tem:ExpirationDate>01/2017</tem:ExpirationDate>\r <tem:NameOnCard>Robert</tem:NameOnCard>\r <tem:LastFourDigit>1234</tem:LastFourDigit>\r <tem:City />\r <tem:Address>14290</tem:Address>\r <tem:Status>ACTIVE</tem:Status>\r <tem:CreatedDate>2017-11-05T10:21:29.9876298-05:00</tem:CreatedDate>\r <tem:LoadMode>Manual</tem:LoadMode>\r <tem:CardType />\r <tem:CardVerficationNumber>998</tem:CardVerficationNumber>\r <tem:RefenceNumber>${ProcessCard#Response#declare namespace ns1='http://tempuri.org/'; declare namespace a='http://schemas.datacontract.org/2004/07/Acriter.ABI.CenPOS.EPayment.VirtualTerminal.v6.Common'; //ns1:ProcessCardResponse[1]/ns1:ProcessCardResult[1]/a:ReferenceNumber[1]}</tem:RefenceNumber>\r <tem:UsePrincipalAddress>true</tem:UsePrincipalAddress>\r <tem:CustomerCode>123456-0</tem:CustomerCode>\r <tem:CustomerEmail>test@cenpso.com</tem:CustomerEmail>\r </tem:CardVO>\r </tem:Cards>\r <tem:ContractNumber>${=String.valueOf( ( int ) Math.floor( Math.random() * 1000000000 ) )}</tem:ContractNumber>\r <tem:PrincipalPaymentMethod>CARD</tem:PrincipalPaymentMethod>\r <tem:SecondaryPaymentMethod>NONE</tem:SecondaryPaymentMethod>\r </tem:addContractRequestVO>\r </tem:AddRecurringContract>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
